3 #permalink 3

3.1 #permalink Logo ==== Text-based logo with CSS diamond decorations.

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Example
Sylphic
Markup 
<a href="/" class="logo" aria-label="Sylphic - Return to homepage">
  <span class="logo__diamond logo__diamond--left" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  <span class="logo__text">Sylphic</span>
  <span class="logo__diamond logo__diamond--right" aria-hidden="true"></span>
</a>
Source: src/assets/scss/modules/_logo.scss, line 1

3.2 #permalink Header CTA ========== Primary action button in header with gradient styling.

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Example
Sign Up
Markup 
<div class="header-cta">
  <a href="#signup" class="header-cta__button">Sign Up</a>
</div>

3.3 #permalink News Bar ======== Closeable announcement bar using the CSS Popover API.

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Example

New Announcement text - Learn more

Markup 
<aside id="news-bar" class="news-bar" popover="manual" role="region" aria-label="Announcement">
  <div class="news-bar__content">
    <p class="news-bar__message">
      <span class="news-bar__badge">New</span>
      Announcement text - <a href="#" class="news-bar__link">Learn more</a>
    </p>
    <button type="button" class="news-bar__close" popovertarget="news-bar" popovertargetaction="hide" aria-label="Dismiss announcement">
      <svg>...</svg>
    </button>
  </div>
</aside>
Source: src/assets/scss/modules/_news-bar.scss, line 1
